name: PlayTime (Demo)
description:
Full Game Coming 2022

Can you escape the doomed Factory? 

In Playtime, you play as Rima, an office manager of a Toy Factory that’s being demolished. On the night before the demolition, she and her other managers must lock up the factory before leaving. But these workers are not the only ones left in the building, and a sinister stowaway has some big plans for the remaining factory staff. It’s time to play…

CREDITS
